soft-diffusion.private: Gentle blending of light and shadow.

warm-glow.private: Golden or reddish light creating cozy warmth.

cool-tint.private: Bluish or greenish light for a cold atmosphere.

lens-flare.private: Streaks of light caused by reflections in the lens.

bloom.private: A soft glow that makes highlights appear radiant.

specular-highlights.private: Bright, reflective spots on shiny surfaces.

shadow-gradient.private: Gradual fading of shadows into light.

rim-lighting.private: Halo-like glow around the subject edges.
